DOC.brief_title: IGEV Followed Autologous Transplantation Refractory Relapsed Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: The standard treatment patient refractory relapse Hodgkin lymphoma salvage chemotherapy follow autologous transplantation responsive patient . However , standard salvage chemotherapy remain uncertain . This study evaluate efficacy safety IGEV regimen single-center basis .
